values:
a lot of shit has happened in the past few weeks.  I visited the grandparents in Florida where i swam in the ocean, pools, golfed, ate good food, drank a 12 pack o heinies with ma pops, got some wicked cool jewelry from my grandmother and shopped a bit... in addition i actually got a tan woooot.. well i already had the starts.. but yeh.. plussss i met a few boys haha... 2 under the age of 4.. and one.. prolly over the age of 21 atleast... he was the first really kyoot black guy to take notice of me I was flattered :-)..
  I have made a transformation this summer to feminine female instead of the complete stubborn tomboy i have always been... i can still be a tomboy and look decent right? anywayz...  

in other news...
I ended up going to a party which was a complete blast from the past... Darlene Fuckin Kehn, Will Andrews, Nick Frazey, Billy Schoonmaker, Joe Zaffutz, Bridget O'connor and Minehan, and yeh.. so much crazy shiot!!! I drank soo much beer.. completed a smoke stack (massive hit off of a beaudious piece and then chuggin a cup o beer), with only a mouthfull of puke after.. then of course, since the hosts live on a lake we hadda go swimmin'... my smart self decided to take out a canoe and explore a bit... upon my attempt to retrieve a ball that had been lost to the lake.. I capsized the canoe... i grabbed my purse and righted the boat asbest i could... treading water.. trying to keep everything in some semblance of order... i dragged the almost completely submerged vessle back to shore... someone was standing on the dock inquiring on my status... and helped a lil... whilst i spread all of my drenched belongings on a towel by the fire.. i take inventory and record my losses... my cell phone, digital camera, and Jay-Z the black album.. fuck fuck fuck was all that was going through my head.. how do i fuck up soo bad.. in a last frenzied attempt to gather my head i go running out, dive into the lake and swim back to the place where i approximated the wreck occured... i dove down a bit.. but the lake was entirely too deep for me to drunkenly recover and phone.. or digital camera... fuck.. al of my pictures from florida.. gone.. all of my 150 or so numbers... gone... the cd that had been keeping me relaxed and sane all summer... gone... so... the real damage....
1 Canon PowerShort A60..... $200
1 Samsung cellular phone... $170
1 Jay-Z The Black Album.... $13.99

The pictures and connections lost.. priceless...

hmm what else...
lotsa chillin out, a eye doctor and gyno appt.. new glasses and some anti-biotics for an e.coli infection i have in my urinary track.. and a clean bill of health otherwise for my Vag... good job kid.. oh yeh and i got my period for the first time since April, isn't that cool?

Most late breaking news.. Jana is again a single, free woman.
I broke up with Andrew yesterday... I hurt him pretty bad... he never wants to talk or see me again.. I guess i deserve it... i mean, how could i break his heart twice in two years and not expect him to be horribly upset... anywayz.. time to have my last meal with my father and brother and mother.. peace out.. and have a good year wherever you may be heading.

so saturday night i shroomed for the first time... in one word... amazing... hah... matt and amanda had a horror film started (shaun of the dead) ... yeh i was thinking not the best thing for me to watch while trippin, but ehhh... it went fine.. i was on a roller coaster of emotions, i would scream with excitement and prolly some starledness and fear mixed in, then laugh at myself for being ridiculous and screaming at the movie.. or just laugh uncontrolably at some of the crazier shit that occured.. then i would have to spend about 5 minutes talking to myself in my head to calm down... THENNNN john and i went on an adventure back to his place, some semi scary happenings occured, but nothing major and we made it home safely.  We proceeded to trip for hours and played tony hawk and the dog and yeh just hung out talking and such. ANYWAYZ... i look forward to doing a full 1/8th in the future... 

hah.. i think the majority of my friends have decided i am crazy... i dunno if it is just in jest or if they are serious.. but i have begun to hear it a lil often and to tell you the truth it scares me a lil bit.. because i do feel crazed and not in control of myself at times.. but oh well.. hah.. John also asked, with a very deep inquisitive look on his face (yes although he is from illinois and sounds like he is stupid, he is quite sharp actually)"you have a lot of interesting conversations with yourself don't you?" hehe.. and yes.. yes i do.. i have found i talk out loud to myself a lot more and have to censor a lot of my thoughts... just because the people around me wouldn't understand and it would take too much effort on my part to explain where the thought came from and itz relevance to the present conversation... ANYWAYZ... back to work i go... PEACE....
and yes steve, a good chunk of my friends here say Peace so neeeh

I am so happy with this summer so far... aside from my lack of money issues (which will be not an issue in a week and a half) i have been havin a blast.  I am surrounded by wonderful people that keep me happy, active and motivated, I am so glad that i have such great friends.  I love my job, i am so happy that i am going to be able to plan lesson plans around kids books, color, bake, sing and laugh all day for the rest of my life, i actually can't wait to "grow up".  My kids at school are awesome, i love every one of them and most of them are growing pretty fond of me i believe.  ANYWAYZ i am already kind of bored of writing in this.. haha.. that was my update...

I have been having a great time hangin out with mattchew, mandy and john.  I worked with matt and john on thursday, then ran errands with em on friday... itz just really chill when we hang out, and i love hangin out with just the guys... i miss that when i am at home... ANYWAYZZZZ i have fallen in love with Jack, John's 8 month purebred all white pitbull with kyoooot pink skin and a lil pink and black splotchy nose.. dahh so kyoot and fun.. so yeh.. i have been partying almost nonstop like... virtually all week... dave z had a b-day party last night, that was a lot of crazzzzzyness and fun... met a few people i hadn't seen in a while from high-school... devon thompson, jeff degnan, christian..somthing.. haha and yeh.. all that jazzzz  plus... i had lesbians swarming all around me wanting my non-existant nuts... man if only i was in a pussy mood there coullda been mad cunnilingus goin on haha... YEH now... i think i am done... i don' really feel like thinkin about the past anymore.. haha "the past" so yeh i mowed the lawn, need to shower, cause i can smell my own stench... and go to mandy's so we can make an appearence at her parent's friend's party and then fireworks with mattchew, mandy and John :).  Should be a fun time.. i can't wait.

as most everyone that reads this knows Andrew came to visit.  After a brief period of anxiety and upsetness from him not waking up on time and me having to call him an hour later to get him out of bed I spent a wonderful Saturday just hangin out, being lazy and catchin up on all the snuggling and huggs that we had been deprived of.  We watched 45 minutes of home movies of me as a lil kid (14 months) definitely entertaining... and had a nice lil bar-b-q with the rents and just... enjoyed each other's company.  We slept in the tent together which was wonderful, no skinny dorm room beds or room mates around or parents or nuthin, just us and the night (maybe a bear or 2 right tootz?).  

We woak up early and had a packed sunday.. lots-o-stuff was accomplished... we hung out with justy and mandy briefly, then went mini golfing.. hell yes i had par the back 9 holes :-) but andrew did end up winning cause i had a crappy run of 3 5 stroke holes in a row :-/ thennnnnnn i filled up on gas for $2.24 a gallon.. yeh thatz right amazing huh? moved onto Jenn's graduation party since tootzie was a bit stressed and obviously needed some company... we only stayed for a brief period since any big to-do at the Teets residence tends to get a lil overwhelming.. although excellently executed and good food all around.  then... napped.. a wonderful nap with some normal napping procrastination of the sexual nature o:-) and yeh.... onto dinner with the rents at ghandi's.. delicious as usual... and to Matt's afterwards to hang out with him, mandy, jamie, tooootzie, lulu and shotty.  I really love those guys... matt is especially cool when he isn't too wasted... I can't wait to help him out at the end of this week, I hope i can be helpful enough... and not in the way.. i think it should be good... ANYWAYz after that we headed to Ron the Freindly's manager's place for a PAR-TAY fucking.. it was so much fun.. good good people thatz for sure... met some awesome dudez and ladiez... Ben, Ron, Aldo, Jill, fuckin Ann Marie cool asss chick!! and yeh played a lot o foooooz ball, i definitely dominated the majority of the time (especially when games were 1 on 1) :-) hehe i lovez it... and a beer pong game.. but thatz not really ma game so yeh... went on 2 adventures one with jill, which ended up with a "goose egg" or in otherwords nothin.. and then a lil walk with ann marie was excellent.. i am callin that chick and we will have so much fun.  Kristine and lulu were gettin their macks on... haha Tootzie was spittin shit the whole time haha and gettin lotza boys' attentions (thatz right of course i was keepin an eye on you tootz) she was quite thoroughly plastered by the time andrew and i left..

ANYWAYZ yeh... had a bit of an emotional drive home but ended with some AMAZING SEX!.... OMG... thatz all i can say here... we were up until 4:15 in the mornin.. fuckin' til the sun came up... quite literally... We hadda wake up at 9:20... that was a lil rough.. but it was steamin' in the tent so we were well motivated... grabbed 2 handlez o cheeep vodka for my bro and had some breakfast and lotsa good kisses and huggs... and byebye andrew... 

Yeh.. so there is my rant and summary of the weekend.. If i missed anything that was fun... well.. this is long enough so there.. haha.. fuckin... I am so happy right now.. mark this one down in the books as one of the most excellent weekends of summer 05... 
now.... who knows.. FUCK! I have an appointment to get my teeth checked out... what time is that... gottta run... 

Peace!

So, i have decided that the worst part of having my wisdom teeth out is that i can't eat food, and thatz about it... I prolly shouldn't smoke weed but i think i am going to try that soon :-) hehe and yeh.. so the pain factor isn't too great and i think everyone else who has had their wisdom teeth out and said it hurt lotz are woooosies hah... jk.. but yeh.. i am done with this for now..

I had such an awesome nice last night.  I wish justin's parents went away like every weekend.  There was a whole smorgishborg (yes i know my spelling is attrocious) of peoples greggy's friends and justin's friends intermingled.. it was neat.  A lot of smoking was done, and a lot of fun was had... 
some of the highlights:
-"drawing contesy"
-dinner was amazing
-many wonderful bowls and bong packs
-the dutch!
-fuckin awesome hacking.. i love people who can hack it hah, yes thatz right i'm really lame
-soul friggin caliber.. that game must raise my blood pressure like woah
-listenin to music
-paper and pencil telephone 
-Bicardi 151
-Heineken, Thank you Tom!
-Tom: "How bout this nug for $5" Me: "I don't have $5"  Tom: "How about $5 whenever ya got it?"  Me=speechless... fuckin awesome.. heh...

so yeh it was a good night everyone was there for atleast a short while.. 

Happy fucking father's day everyone

and fucking.. 5 days till i see ma boi! woooot

Yeh... how cool is it to be able to wake up at 11 after partying all night, go across the hall, roll a few joints take a walk out amongst the trees with all the cool changing leaves find a nice lil quiet spot by some train tracks and a bridge... everyone sits down and smokes their own joint to their face, then after a fruity deliciously refreshing Jamba juice, bagel and bowl of soup head home to gather some odds and ends,  roll a blunt.. plus ohh yeh another joint.  Have a nice walk with your friends, take lotsa pictures and enjoy a blunt, joint and bowl on the river shore with runners and people walking their dogs passing by.. anywayz! yeh Halloween was pretty friggin cool... hope everyone else had a cool time

For those of you who have been worried about Justy he is doing well.  I spent Saturday with the Tarsa family (yes be jelous).  I unfortunatly didn't get to see Justy but they said that he was doing well.  Additionally, i talked to Justy on Saturday night and he said he was feeling a whole lot better and getting back into the swing of things.  anywayz.. i gotta run.. this is quite a hell week... midterm monday, wednesday and thursday, 10 page paper due tuesday and 4 page paper due wednesday and yeh... so no sleep for Jana... due to studying... and other pre-occupations ;-) hehe, yeh so everyone be happy and stay safe... i know no one else has the scaryness of a Boston Red Sox world series right across the street... but yeh... tood-a-looo

The Red Sox are victorious even though all odds have been against them.  When ya lose 3 games in a row never is it expected that you'll come back to win a series against your arch rival...  Well they fucking did it and are the first baseball team to do it.. ever... Congratz to the Red Sox.  It was cool to walk down Beacon street and hear a happy roaring crowd of Bostonians and Sox fans over by Fenway... then as i got closer to Kenmore Square it seemed as if i was at a night club thee were so many strobe lights... and by strobe lights i mean cop cars and riot squad trucks... it was quite an amazing site to see... Again, i express how cool it was to see all of these Red Sox fans so happy... but i ask.. if you are so fucking happy.. why the fuck would you commit so many acts of vandalism and violence?  I don't understand people in general... Oh.. and another thing... the riot squads and police force stood on and watched as most of this happened... If a small group of 100 or less peace protestors were to crowd the streets in such a manner or even resist directions from an officer they would be arrested and possibly dealt with in a more physical manner.. what the fuck?...Anywayz... those are some of my thoughts...  

Only time shall tell whether the curse is actually broken... good luck to the Sox

the potential to make people go curraaazzy.
You are always enjoyed. You are tasty AND
effective.

It has been a while... sorry to those who really care.  This is the first day at work that  it hasn't been a mad house so i am taking the time to update briefly.  Well these last few weeks have been filled with pot smoking, alcohol drinking, hanging out and small amounts of work... but i actually am feeling pretty good about the majority of my classes so yay!  My parents were right, i came to school this semester and made friends with a whole crew of hardcore potheads from various places such as germany, switzerland, um a few other cool places that i can't remember now... so needless to say many "walks down by the river" have been taken.   I really love my room mates they are all friggin awesome and we have a lot of fun together.   Yeh.. i don' really know what else i should include in this.  As much as i love it here i do definitely have a few lil empty places in my heart.  I really miss Owen... and i do miss the chill hanging out that always happened at home.. but oh well.. now Jana shall return to tryign to complete some reading...

went to schenectady hung out with Owen and the 16 y.o autistic boy, Dallas until about 10:30ish... grabbed some coffee at Rich's cafe and then strolled teh streets... eventually made it to our place of choice to be alone, the dock in schenectady park which is on the mohawk river... we drank a big bottle of my mom's blueberry wine, talked a lot.. and yeh... some other stizzuff and we ended up sleeping... for a short period curled up in one sleeping bag under the stars on the dock... around 6 we get woaken up by a guy that had come to go fishing so we walked back drowsily to my car and slept for a while... yeh just.. lots of goodness.. these last 2 weeks have been incredible... 

and now... at 8:30 tomorrow morning i shall set out for boston.  the car is all packed... i will have to tie my futon on to the roof tomorrow and yeh,....

I leave Friday morning 8:30 or 9ish..  I can't wait to see all of my boys, i am going to give Bruce and Aram and Alex and Andrew and Amar and Tom and Josh and Rob and Laura and and and nancy and cristina and Joe and everyone.. the biggest hugs in the world... but alas.. there will be a spot in my heart that aches for Owen... we are going to write letters, and talk on the phone... but... it is going to suck horribly not having him around.. when we are together...just... yeh... it is wonderful... ok.. i don;t really wanna go on about this.. so.. i guess this is going to be a silly short mushy entry and ya'll are gonna like it... 

why must i fall in love so quickly? ::sigh::

my brother is 15 and he apparently started a novel... here is the website where you can read it... he is so great i love ma lil bro.... what a wonderfulk.. (FULK!) world..

http://www.freewebs.com/zarnanepicbattle/

This is more for myself than for everyone.. but i figured.. i would prolly wanna tell a lot of people most of this wonderousness anyways.. so..I need to make a list of everything that happened over the span of latenight thursday, august 19th to the early morning of sunday, august 22nd.  

Owen sits down next to us, starts talking to amanda, i see him and am just like... wow... he has my hair.. how crazy.. i hope mandy makes friends with him (she is always good at making cool guys become a part of our hang out group)

Then, We met....
~play some sort of cats cradle type game with one of my hair bands... twisting and preserving the shape of it and yeh...
~play a bit of hacky sac...

he leaves to get beer somwhere....

~i am playing with a cat a block or so away from the bar
~he comes over and we start playing with the cat together and talking...
~we decide to start attempting to walk across a very thin fence on the side of the sidewalk
~eventually we get good enough that we can meet in the middle multiple times... and it is just an invigorating experience...
~then we went to hang out in my car with everyone else
~we smoke a bit

~owen and i move outside of the car and talk about working with kids, family, experiences..... and just... lots of stuff
~we decided to go swimming in the mohawk river, well owen and i... on the way we are eaten alive by bugs

~we go to dunkin donuts.. i'm not sure why.. just hung out there, played hacky sac, talk etc
~go across the street and play in a big open field:tag, wrestle, tumbling and martial artsy stuff, then everyone ended up sitting around and talking and everyone was paired off, in lil massage pairs.. manderz and jr, tootz and jay and me and owen.. lotsa talking..
~went to owen's old apartment that is unlocked.. no furniture or anything...
~sat around talking and smoking a bit...
~manderz, tootzie, jr and jay left; owen and i hung out together for the rest of the night

~went out for a walk and left flowers on someone's mailbox, balanced on fencing and such...
~returned to apartment: colored, played cards, laughed, had a pretty pg-13 night... well... maybe r... neh pretty pg13... and stayed up all night...

~at about 7:30am i think... we went out and started walking through an old graveyard and around the town.. it was a stockade,.. and it is so historic and the gorgeous buildings were built in the 1700 or 1800s and we picked flowers to decorate each other with and played with a dog (paulie), and talked to townies, and got coffee and walked more and swang on swings... 
~and yeh, then we left and headed to my house, listened to music talked etc.. i called my mom on the way home.. and told her that i had stayed with owen.. and she was mad because she thought i lied to her since i had said before i was sleeping at amanda's even though i was planning on it at the time... so she was mad.. plus i was bringing a "random stranger from scotia no less" into her home... i was a lil worried...but i thought mom would be ok...

~we walk into my house and my mom is obviously pissed...
~she looks at owen... and then starts talking to him... and realizes... things just happened... and i wasn't being bad... just twitterpated (not her words)after 5 or 10 minutes of talking to him she is like.. can you please go outside and come back in so we can get off on the right foot? so we do... and yes gloriousness

~we hang out in my room and house; look at pictures, random stuff, talk, listen to music,nap, play nintendo, look at FEW movies... he thinks all of them are hilarious, go for a walk, make omelets and bacon for my dinner for my brother, dad and ourselves...

~head over to aaron apple's were Dan STangl's band is playing, plus jason luby's and another band.. lots of fun was had, we played hackysac, and danced, he ,met alot of cool averill parkians... really liked kopache and dan guitonie (sp?)and dustin.. funny that those are some of my favorites aswell... 
~go over to justy's and hang out with marilu before she goes back, tootzie, manderz, emily, greggy, justy of course, kopache and sam R then jr and.... his friend.. i can't remember his name... will? anywayz played pool, smoked pot, ate yummy food... 
~he thinks all of my friends are great

~returned to my house for the night, started to watch good will hunting.. we fell asleep on the couch prolly around 3:30 or 4... i woak up at 8:30 or 9... let him sleep a bit, turned on the tv and watched ghostbusters, he eventually woak up and yeh we just chilled, then we played scrabble and made delicious pesto and goodness sandywhiches... (not necessarily in that ordeR) tried to download a lot of music... listened to a lot of music, watched finding forrester, he loved it like i knew he would, danced together to stevie wonder "you are the sunshine of my life" and "somewhere over the rainbow", better than ezra "Extra ordinary" just ta name a few... 

~head over to amanda's before we go to the vandyke to see Patty play
~annie, johnnie, betsy and steve are playing when we walk in so owen and i dance briefly, then head up to mander'z room hang out with justy and mandy.., owen gets out her guitar and plays, then i go get the drum, and we smoke some  and play some more together.. 

~eventually we left to go to the vandyke... in which owen took mandy'z usual place of navigating
~he proceeds to make us take a round about route cause i got him occupied with opening candy for me and didn't realize we needed to take the exit i was going to take (thought we were on a diff. highway) 

~so we finally get to the vandyke, drink about 1/3 of our forties then head in, patty is in the middle of playing,she was really good, i covered a paper bag in artwork after making a spoon man... owen and i talked and yeh.. after patty's we were hanging out outside again...

~we decided to go to Dawn's appartment, owen and i left gummy worms on the mailbox we had left the flower on the night before, and at dawn's we hang out a bit drink our forty's, smoke somme more, listen to black eyed peas, i color more, and draw more crazyness on a plate, then we headed out to another bar to meet a few of owen's friends.. 

~we get there, i go in with owen to the bar, meet his friends, say hello, but the bartender says without bID that says i'm 21 i need to stay outside so i go outside smoke with mandy and justy quickly, owen comes out shortly and says his friends are coming, they come out.. i was a lil less social than usual cause i wasn't interested n being engulfed by cigarrette smoke, but i really wanted to meet rocky and chuck.. we started to play hacky sac and then cops yelled at us and said we couldn't hang out there.. we continued to loiter a lil longer, and then... we parted ways, owen went with his friends and i went with mine...

what can i say to sum all of this up?....
It was/is so amazingly incredibly, that it seems almost surreal... and now... i don't really wanna go back to school yet...

latelly (and by latelly i mean a good part of this summer) it has been really easy for me to get into a very low and depressive mood.. whenever i get alone with my thoughts everything just seems to progress downhill... it might be coincidence.. or maybe not.. that since i started firming up my decision of breaking up with steve i have found that i seem to aquire the common symptoms of depression... and a lot of time i just want to.. or do cry and yeh whatever.. i am kind of disapointed in myself that after a year of college i have become almost dependant on the presence of others... i used to really value my alone time and be able to enjoy it... but now.. i sometimes dread just driving in the car somewhere for fear that a song on the radio will set me off.  welp there is one of my first actually "theraputic" type lj entries... hope everyone enjoyed the journey into the darker side of jana's mind
it has been probably closer to 3 months since anything exciting has happened in jana's love life.... so yeh... just so we all are on the same page...

yehh... the first and the last girl i will ever have any type of a relationship with is in town for a week... I visited her today and it was a lil weird... but fun at the same time... and i must say i felt a lil nestalgic even though about all that she had brought me before was lots of emotional baggage and female bitchyness with a side of sexual fun and girlish kyootness... anywayz.. there was a lot of sexual tention between us... she has a gf and i don' wanna get involved with her.. so.. yeh.. it sux not having any sexual fun for... more than a month dah... well.. maybe Kopache will be at Stangl's party and we can hook up ::crosses fingers:: he is also having a party sunday... sept it is a family thing.. but we shall see... yeh... i have lost hope in anything happening with Brent this summer.. he is really busy... and doesn't sound like he will ever have the time to make it to lil ol'sand lake... so yeh... ok i guess that is enough for this update... oh yeh.. and i kind of really can't wait to go to school

so yeh itz saturday... slept until 11:53... not noon... got up and bumbled around blindly since my contacts hurt like a bitch when i tried to put em in and i couldn;t... and still can't locate my glasses.. so yeh... then my mom was like hay wanna go shopping for school supplies.. and of course i was like YESSSSS! so we went to staples and i got 2 notebooks, 2 folders, an assignment book, highlighters, sticky notes, contact paper, and white out :-)oh yeah and a new box of 48 crayons :-) such pretty colors for me to color pictures with... i can't wait to use them.. in fact thatz what i shall do first upon finishing this lil entry.  ok so yeh after that get home, i am bored.. hang out online.. my brother gets home,... we "hang out" as i start to clean my room,then i take a break to go and get my dad ta smoke me up and then go back to cleaning my room when then he harrasses me to bring  him to a friend's house and i say after my room is clean.  after i get it cleaned my brother insists we start my 1000 piece grateful dead puzzle.. so we do.. and omg it is one of the most overwhelming things i have ever taken on... yeh so anywayz, not much got done with that.. and my brother and i had a boxing match... i held my own.. he is a bit bigger and stronger than me and i only got hit in the boob once... my poor left nipple... it burnz! hehe anywayz yeh,... not i am all alone... all of my friends that i can handle hanging out with one on one or in a small group are busy or not around.. so sadly... here we are... hope this wasn't too boring.. and if it was.. itz your own fault for reading the whole damned thing.. so yeh...

welp, i am rather bored... the kids were quite impossible today at work... i wish i could have hog-tied one of the girls when i had to change her diaper.. dah.. anywayz i saw a cat that got hit by a car in the opposite lane as i was driving home.. i slowed down... and almost stopped.. but then kept driving, i was dwelling on it... so i decided to turn around and go to the nearest house and see if they owned a gray and white cat...Just so they would know it got hit... and if they wanted to they could get the body before it got grinded into the road... anywyaz... i went to the house.. no one answered... sadness... well the whole thing makes me sad the kitty was so pretty.. dah...  Later on down the road i realize it is July 30... and think shit i think i had an appointment with my knee doctor.. well i would have except he had canceled the appointment and it is really monday... ::wipez sweat from forehead:: anywayz i was too tired/lazy to go to the Y.. so i passed by it after promising myself i would go running at home tonight after i napped.. got home, sat online for a while then took a nice 4 hour nap.. heh i meant to only sleep for an hour and a half.. but oh well.. got laundry done.. yay and actually went for a half hour run!!! wooohoo it was a gorgeous night perfectly cool and the air wasn;t humid or anything... sadness: i got bitten by somthing cause my elbow is burning and swollen and red... glorious... i can;t wait to go back to school.. but at the same time i wish the summer would slow down a bit and certain people could find a lil time to see me.. Brentley..yeh... i dunno what is with him, but i enjoy his company so yeh anywayz i duno what else to write about.. so i guess i am done..

i had just gotten off the phone with steve... that phone call went really well actually... and we arenow broken up... and he seems ok with it... and i think we should still be able to talk and it will be cool... i am not sure if he really understands.. probably not... he has always had a problem understanding me... and somtimes the tables are turned... but yeh... so anywayz.. i got off the phone with steve and get a text message almost immediatly from Travis, the singer from travisty theory and apparently he lost his phone last night in all his drunkenness.. and amanda and i should have just hung out at northern lights in there cause they were just drinking with sevendust and everythig and dah but yeh they are heading down to NYC today... but were talking about wanting to hang out so he is keeping my number and they should be back in town in a few days.. so hopefully i'll get a call and be able to hang out.. :-) sweetness anywayz... yeh i feel like a huge load has been lifted off my chest now that i have talked to steve... i think i said most of everything i wanted to say.. a little bit got left out but i felt like i told him what i wanted to.. so yeh... there is my entry

There is entirely too much that has gone on for me to do a complete update... so i am just gonna talk about last night since that was in-fukkin amazing.  Went to a show purely to see nonpoint, and sevendust was cool, but the opening band travisty theory was just a great rock and roll band jamming out.. a lot of the crowd wasn;'t into them but i thought it was awesome and teh bassline was somthing Justy would cream his pants over... well maybe not that incredible but quite good. so i was like ok, they are gonna be out in the crowd i am gonna talk to the bassist when he gets out.  So the singer comes out first, i talk to him, say nice set get that he is from jackson mississippi and yeh his name is Travis.. then i asked about the bassist he was like ohh his name is Chad he'll be out in a bit.  so i went to the merch table and talked to chad.. come to find out he went ta skool at emerson in boston wooohooo and yeh we talked about boston a lot and yeh make this short, i got a free t-shirt, they gave us one of their cell numbers to call so we could go to their hotel party... amanda and i smoked up Chad then played soccer with some random drunk guy in the parking lot.. and then headed over to the marriot where they were supposed to be staying.. it was like 1:30.. we had given them an hour and a half or so to get their shit together and go... but yeh they didn;'t answer.. mandy and i passed the time... and yeh at like 2:15 mandy wanted to leave... i hung out in my car until 2:45... called them one last time, then left.. so the night didn't end up quite as kool as we had planned.. but the music was incredible it was awesome talking to the guys a lil bbit and yeh great night.... and now i go to call steve, seeing as he is back from field training...

today has been just an incredible day.  I had an awesome weekend... playing at the beach yesterday, and even a freezing dip in the ocean... then today just full of lazing around then playing outside in the horrible hot, yet incredibly satisfying weather then the day just kept going and going not allowing me to do any work once so ever cause i just wanted to savor every wonderful moment with everyone here that was possible.  then, after the night was starting to slow down i read an IM from Steve, just telling me he wants to tal to me cause he was worried about a test and little things like that, so i called him and we talked for a while... and god, i still love him so much.... even though i knew i stilled loved him, it just got magnified tenfold.  Now, i believe we have a truly good system... we are dating but not exclusively... so now i guess we'll see how things go with andrew... it was so wonderful to talk to him and hear him laugh and know he is smiling as he talked to me.... anywayz, even though all this wonderousness is going on i really have to buckle down and get my friggin major papers done, considering one is worth 30% and the other 25% i believe... yeh not to mention studying nd everything... ok, i am about done for this entry...

I have so many mixed feelings... i don't really know what may come out as i continue typing... At first, his seemingly irrational conclusion that he never wants to speak to me again hurt more than anything i have ever experienced...  but... i guess it has actually made it easier... i still cry a little here and there... but, i can't talk to him and change my mind and beg him to take me back... I am really worried about him... for the last three years i have been there for him to talk to...to support him... but now i'm not.. and i guess he may be right... i did abandon him in a way... but, i don't understand why he didn't talk to me and try to change my mind right there and then when i told him i thought i needed some time for personal growth.... it is hard, because i still look around my room, or take a shower and think of him... after years of connecting him with anything i see or do it is hard to stop... i don't like being alone for that reason, when i get left to myself i think too much...i don't know if i'll ever stop loving him... I hope he will come around and atleast talk to me... i still want to know how he is doing and be able to watch him grow as a person.  Well.. atleast my FEW boys have been good, keeping me busy... and i am going to buckle down and start working on my two big papers soon... so yeh.. that is my jumble of thoughts...
I may have just followed through on the worst decision of my life...

I finished my History paper, this morning, yes it is due at 3:30 today.. yay  yay.  I think i am getting over my lil bout off depression... could be that ma work is done and the day i see stevie is closer.. but ehh who knowz... I wanna be laying around, relazing and or sleeping in ma room, i don't feel like sittin here at work uselessly.. maybe i am weird but i really hate not being busy, or actually working whilst at work.  I feel like i am being paid so i really should be doing somthing productive... but here.. I have my cooworker on the pone talking about all sorts of personal stuff and other work studies writing papers and such.  bahh.  I am really looking forward to my writing class, i get back our first draft of our first major paper today so i get to see how hard the rest of this semester is going to be considering how much criticism he has for my writing.. then in history i get our first test back.. that should be good.   dahh is that all i have to write about... hmmmm i dunno i guess so, today is looking gorgeous and i get to see my sweetie stevie in two days ::dances around happily:: man i wish i brought some of my V-day chocolate to work with me, i have a hard core erge for some delicious chocolate....

I have no idea what has come over me, i just all of a sudden feel so depressed... I just want to have Steve here, i don't even want to think about any of my work, i am even getting tired of almost everyone here..I just wish it was Steve and me, i want to fast forward through school, i don't even care what i am doing i could just be a housewife, whatever i want to be with him and know that he is always around and can hold me at night... 

     FEW which used to be a sort of safety for me has just lost its appeal...it is so hard to stay over on FEW because alex and laura are there always being kyoot and snuggly and plah and then i have started to really not appreciate the sense of humor bruce, alex and rob have.. which kind of sux because it goes on constantly.. halo is becoming less fun because even though i am getting slowly better other people are starting to develop annoying habits that get others pissed at them and i hate being in the middle of it.. I don't want to write these silly papers, just sit me down with the professor or my TA and i will argue a bit with them, that is what i wannabe graded on.. i friggin sat down with a friend and helped him get out an awesome thesis,.. but no i can;t do it for myself.. ok i should prolly go to bed... it may take a while for me to get to sleep.... i am hoping this mood will go away because it is imparative that i am productive tomorrow..

well, these are a lil weird... but hay... kind of fun

Welp, seeing as i havn't written since i have been back there is obviously a lot that could be included in this.  Steve and I had a great time.  We had the greatest dinner ever, we stayed in, microwaved hot dogs and drank chocolate milk... it was wonderously romantic ::nodnod:: umm yeh it was great being with him..   we even hung out over on FEW one of the nights and ma FEW boiz and my Sweetie Steve were laughing together, such a great sight.  anywayz, so yeh i spent close to $300 on books, which isn't tooo bad looking back the the close to $500 last semester.  My math class is a joke.. we talked about real numbers and irrational numbers and integers and sets the first lesson, then second lesson we talked about polynomials and exponents.. sillyness.. the woman that i work with in the records office is in the class aswell.. except this stuff is hard for her considering she has been out of school for years.  My history class should be good, a lot of reading in a well written text book , and a few writing assignments but nothing horrible and the professor is a decent lecturer she doesn't drone on in a monotone or studder.  My writing class should be good aside from the immense amount of reading due every tuesday and thursday but ohh well.  Psych is psych.. i haven't heard him lecture yet so we will see how that goes, not too much reading there... only about 20-40 pages every tuesday and thursday....  so yeh.  I am actually doing well turning my study habits around.  I have read so much for my courses it is crazy... i think i am already infringing on the amount of reading i did all last semester... well not really. but after two weeks of this performance... seriously i may.  The first night i started all the reading i felt really overwhelmed and dah... plus i just wanted to know that i'd be sleeping with steve that night, like the past few nights.... but that would not be the case... ::sigh:: being dependant on somone's presence i guess you have to take the good with the bad... dooby doo i dunno not too much more to say.. except for the fact that -30 to -40 degrees is f-ing cold and ridiculous i want snow not cold... ok so yeh i'm done...

i am already all packed and have the majority of the stuff in the car and it is only 11:50 daahhh. I got up at 10 cause i couldn't sleep any more, was finished packing at 11 then went and cleaned off steve's car and packed everything except for two bags and now i seriously have no idea what to do until i shower and go pick up my baby...i don;'t have enough time for a movie, no one is online, i don;t have abook to read.. GAH and i just wanna see my stevie.  seriously.. i have so much crap stuffed in steve's tiny car i did leave enough room for his massive bag.. but it was tough.  ok i guess ill just go watch a movie and hope the time passes quickly that way... tooodaloo everyone.

Now that i have finished harry potter the order of the pheonix i don't quite know what to do with myself.  I have watched entirely too many movies this vacation i feel like i should be doing somthing more.  I went with amanda and saw the wailers last night.. for those who don;t know who the wailers are they are the band that played with bob marley so it was all cool reggaeness and they found a singer that really did sound almost exactly like marley.  
i can't wait to see my stephen... 5 days... dahh still an eternity.. well i don;t have anything else to babble about.. so i guess i'm done for now.. maybe i'll find somthing else to read that i can get done in a few days...

Well, it is a happy new year after all... for a while i thought it was going to be a very lonely and soggy new year... When Steve told me that he didn't think we should continue as girlfriend and boyfriend a ton of bricks got dropped onto my chest and my stomach churned horribly... even though it was only a few days i don't ever want to have to deal with the thought of having to exist without knowing Steve is there to talk to, and hold me, and laugh with.. or at me.  When he agreed to giving me a last chance the bricks were removed... i was not instantly happy, because i understand that it will be some work for me to act accordingly in order to truly show my devotion to Steve and our relationship, but now the world seems brighter than ever.  I can't wait to be near him again and to be able to spend a whole 3 days with him... i wish we both had more time so we could be together more... i suppose that shall be somthing i have to anxiously wait for.  
OK.. harry potter is calling my name and seeing as it is only 8:30 i should really find somthing to do..

Welp, i got home last night.. not too bad of a ride, only 3 hours and 15 minutes even with some traffic in boston and since it was with Steve it was more enjoyable than anything else...  I ended up having to share a room with my brother since my mom doesn't want me sleeping with Steve cause of my brother "being too young" so yeh,... this morning he is getting ready for school, and i wake up with the wonderous idea that i should drive him into school and penetrate the old H.S.  Well it worked like a charm.. i walked in with my brother and Miss Megan took a double take and then was all happy and silly and immidiatly walked me to the office to get me signed in as a guest... ms.cioffi was like i'm not supposed to do this... but miss megan was just like ohhh she'll be out before classes start... and yeh :-) so i went and said hi to Mr. McP, Mr. VanVliet, Steig, Mr. Ladd, JoZ and yeh... I tried to find Mr. McKeeby and Gaynor... but alas they were MIA... ohhh and i dropped in on the first gym class, and Hershy and Man-dici let me play speedball i was so excited, Stangl and Apple and Dan Schwartz was there and it was just like last year... well minus a few crucial people, but hey, no one is perfect.  Um Um... ohh yeh, went back home snuggled with Steve for a lil bit, then made some grilled cheese, packed up my boi and went to the airport.  I stayed there until he was done with security and walking to his gate,... so about an hour or so and then went to crossgates to get my phone fixed considering i killed it the other day wrestling with one FEW boi or another and got a "replacement phone" aka the same exact phone that i already had for $50 since the damage was unfixable... then i did a lil shopping got my stevie somthin... then i've been hangin around online ever since... ohhh being home...

I love my job.  I get paid to sit around and do things such as talk to my friends online, read e-mail,do homework and catch up on the news.  The rare times that i do "work" it is usually pretty mindless and consists of filing pieces of paper into a disheveled cabinet with the various members of the School of Ed. , but when filing, for 5 out of every 7 papers the folder i need to file that paper in does not seem to be here.   One of the more interesting aspects of my job is how i am the one that answers the majority of phone calls; "Hello, School of Education Records Office how can I help you?"  following this lil schpeel somone on the other end goes into some long elaborate explanation of a problem that they have and need assistance with.  After listening to all this i basically tell the person that does the real work, Lisa, a short summary of what i think to be the sitch and she in turn actually deals with the person.  I, in actuality, have no question answering abilities so when people walk into the office, i am required to look up, say, "Hi, What can I help you with?" then hope Lisa was listening and have her explain what the need to do, or if i am here by myself i stare blankly at them for a brief second, file through my memory and try to remember if Lisa has ever answered this question and then say, "I am not quite sure but......."  good times at SED Records...  I suppose it is a good thing because now i will have ample time to update this nice little journal even if it is only rambling about nothing that is at all important.  I guess i will actually attempt to study some American Politics.

well, here is the first entry... wooo not a live journal virgin anymore.. Today was the last day of my field experience.  No more getting up at 6 every Wednesday morning hopping on a big yellow school bus and riding for 45 mins-an hour.  Aside from that no funness though i am really gonna miss my chillens.  They all made me adorable cards, and i played kick ball today... kicked a triple, which should been a home run if i wasn't in dress shoes on a slushy icey blacktopped surface and caught a ball kicked by one of the kids that enjoys giving me the hardest time:-).  Umm so yeh, i think that is sufficient for my first entry... we'll see how long i keep up writing here... onto working on a paper... joy of all joyz
